name: Amazing cat saves the world from space blobs
name_original: Amazing cat saves the world from space blobs
description:
"Amazing cat saves the world from space blobs" is a game made for Game Maker's Toolkit Jam.

You attack moving on the same direction twice. See the yellow blob in the pic? Press the right arrow key to attack it.

Stuck? Full walkthrough here.

I liked the concept of making a game where you only used the arrow keys to move around and all your attacks/skills had to be activated through combos. I had just a couple of hours to make the game, so I had to stick to the most basic stuff (and forget about having 2-3 different combos).  

Controls lag a bit, sorry about that! Music source here.
